name: CommVault
description: The **Commvault Security IQ** plugin shares backup anomaly insights with Netskope (Cloud Exchange) to inform organizations when suspicious behaviour and data changes are occurring within backup content using Commvault REST APIs.

configuration.label: Command Center API URL
configuration.description: CommVault Command Center URL which alerts are pushed to/pulled from For eg: 'https://commandcenter.nam.contoso.com/commandcenter/api' (Include /commandcenter/api)

configuration.label: Initial Range (in days)
configuration.description: Number of days to pull the data for the initial run.
